statements: SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements
SELECT celebrity_name, brand_name FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements
SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements WHERE partnership_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT celebrity_name FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements
SELECT celebrity_name, COUNT(*) AS total_endorsements FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements GROUP BY celebrity_name
SELECT * FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements ORDER BY partnership_start_date DESC, partnership_end_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT celebrity_name, brand_name FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements WHERE partnership_end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT celebrity_name, COUNT(*) AS endorsements_count FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements GROUP BY celebrity_name ORDER BY endorsements_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT brand_name FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements
SELECT celebrity_name, brand_name, partnership_start_date, partnership_end_date FROM celebrity_fashion_endorsements WHERE brand_name LIKE '%Nike%';
SELECT * FROM Celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrity WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, name, headquarters FROM Brand WHERE year_founded > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Celebrity WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT name, category FROM Brand;
SELECT * FROM Celebrity WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrity WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Celebrity WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrity WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, category FROM Brand WHERE year_founded > 2000 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM celebrity;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand ORDER BY industry DESC;

SELECT celebrity.name, brand.brand_name FROM celebrity INNER JOIN endorsement ON celebrity.celebrity_id = endorsement.celebrity_id INNER JOIN brand ON endorsement.brand_id = brand.brand_id WHERE endorsement.partnership_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT celebrity.name AS celebrity_name, brand.brand_name AS brand_name FROM celebrity CROSS JOIN brand WHERE celebrity.age < 25 AND brand.headquarters = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM celebrity;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrity WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brand ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT celebrity.name, brand.brand_name FROM celebrity JOIN endorsement ON celebrity.celebrity_id = endorsement.celebrity_id JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = endorsement.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM endorsement WHERE partnership_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, profession FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT name, industry FROM brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM partnerships WHERE partner_company LIKE '%Inc%';
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, b.name AS brand_name, e.start_date FROM celebrities c JOIN endorsements e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN brands b ON e.brand_id = b.id ORDER BY e.start_date DESC;
SELECT b.name AS brand_name, p.partner_company, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM brands b JOIN partnerships p ON b.id = p.brand_id WHERE p.start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT DISTINCT c.name AS celebrity_name, c.profession, b.name AS brand_name, b.industry FROM celebrities c JOIN endorsements e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN brands b ON e.brand_id = b.id WHERE c.age < 40 AND b.industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY c.name ASC, b.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM celebrity;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT brand_id, partner_brand_id, agreement_date FROM partnership ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT name, industry, country FROM brand WHERE industry = 'Fashion' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT celebrity_id, brand_id, start_date, end_date FROM endorsement WHERE payment > 5000;
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, e.start_date, b.name AS brand_name FROM celebrity c JOIN endorsement e ON c.id = e.celebrity_id JOIN brand b ON e.brand_id = b.id;
SELECT brand_id, SUM(payment) AS total_payment FROM endorsement GROUP BY brand_id HAVING total_payment > 10000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, p.agreement_date, b1.name AS brand_name FROM celebrity c JOIN partnership p ON c.id = p.brand_id JOIN brand b1 ON p.partner_brand_id = b1.id;
SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, b.country, c.occupation FROM celebrity c JOIN campaign cp ON c.id = cp.celebrity_id JOIN brand b ON cp.brand_id = b.id WHERE cp.budget < 50000;
